meanings.definition: A small, striped rodent typically found in North America.
meanings.sent1: Chipmunks are cute animals with stripes on their backs.
meanings.sent2: I saw chipmunks running around in the forest.
meanings.sent3: The chipmunks in the park were having a picnic with tiny sandwiches.
meanings.sent4: The chipmunks scurried around like little furry acrobats.
meanings.sent5: The children giggled as they watched the chipmunks play in the garden.

meanings.definition: To store data or programs on a small, removable electronic device.
meanings.sent1: I need to chipmunks this file onto my USB drive.
meanings.sent2: She chipmunksed all her photos onto a memory card.
meanings.sent3: He decided to chipmunks the important documents for safekeeping.
meanings.sent4: The students quickly chipmunksed the presentation onto their laptops.
meanings.sent5: Remember to chipmunks your work regularly to avoid losing it.
